channel.title: BTC on BloxTop

item.title: BTC short trade
item.description: BTC short trade BTC shows weak today and reaches the resistance 10350. I’m not saying the bullish is over, but at leat a short-term pullback may appear.

item.title: BTC long trade 2
item.description: BTC long trade 2 Previously on BTC long trade: It has broken the resistance strongly.

item.title: BTC long trade
item.description: BTC long trade It has broken the resistance strongly. Long opportunity may continue after a pullback in near future.
